Package game

Class GameServer

java.lang.Object
game.GameServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class GameServer extends Object implements Runnable
This is the GameServer class that creates a thread for each new client.
Author:
Skylar Phanenhour, Ahnaf Kamal

      Parameters:
      log - - Text area to display messages
      socket - - Server socket
      listOfClients - - Array list for each connected client
      leaderboard - - Array list for the user's on the leaderboard

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Runnable method that infinitely loops while the server socket is open. Waits to accept client sockets and adds them to the server.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • disconnectServer

      protected void disconnectServer()
      Disconnects the server and end all of the client connections
